metadata.title: CVE-2024-35983 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bounds: Use the right number of bits for power-of-two CONFIG_NR_CPUSbits_per() rounds up to the next power of two when passed a power oftwo.  This causes crashes on some machines and configurations.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
